Room.Name: Islandia Drive
Room.ShortDescription: You are on Islandia Drive, walking on the south side of the Cathedral.
Room.LongDescription: Various things might be said about the Cathedral of Worldly Bliss, but most of it isn't all that great. This is primarily because the people don't fully understand the power of these great clerics and their purpose in Oceancrest. Without the Cathedral, it is likely the city would plunge into the first level of hell, if not deeper.
